name: Eclipse (itch) (Quiet Team)
description:
STORY :

     Every 1000 years, on the day when the stars align and a solar eclipse occurs. It was a time the ocean was weak. Cthulhu, the great monster that was imprisoned in the deepest part of the sea for a long time, had returned to attack the land again. Now the players are Guardians, that have a duty to protect this fortress.

CONTROLLER :
  • Shoot : Left Mouse
  • Reload : Right mouse
